trans-unit.source: Controls the system garbage collector, a service that automatically reclaims unused memory.
trans-unit.target: 控制系統記憶體回收行程，它是自動回收未使用之記憶體的服務。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector is a common language runtime component that controls the allocation and release of managed memory.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程是控制項的配置和釋放的 managed 記憶體的通用語言執行階段元件。

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class influence when garbage collection is performed on an object and when resources allocated by an object are released.
trans-unit.target: 物件和釋放物件所配置的資源時執行記憶體回收時，就會影響此類別中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Properties in this class provide information about the total amount of memory available in the system and the age category, or generation, of memory allocated to an object.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中的屬性系統的年齡類別目錄或產生，配置給物件的記憶體中提供可用的記憶體總數量的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector tracks and reclaims objects allocated in managed memory.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會追蹤，而且會回收配置於 managed 記憶體中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Periodically, the garbage collector performs garbage collection to reclaim memory allocated to objects for which there are no valid references.
trans-unit.target: 定期記憶體回收行程執行記憶體回收回收記憶體配置給物件的有無有效的參考。

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection happens automatically when a request for memory cannot be satisfied using available free memory.
trans-unit.target: 使用可用記憶體無法滿足記憶體要求時，會自動發生記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, an application can force garbage collection using the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，應用程式可以強制記憶體回收集合使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection consists of the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收包含下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector searches for managed objects that are referenced in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會搜尋在 managed 程式碼所參考的 managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector tries to finalize objects that are not referenced.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會嘗試完成未參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector frees objects that are not referenced and reclaims their memory.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程釋放未參考的物件，並會回收記憶體。

trans-unit.source: This topic includes the following sections:
trans-unit.target: 本主題包含下列章節：

trans-unit.source: [The garbage collector and unmanaged resources](#unmanaged)
trans-unit.target: [記憶體回收行程和 unmanaged 的資源](#unmanaged)

trans-unit.source: [Object aging and generations](#generations)
trans-unit.target: [物件的過時和層代](#generations)

trans-unit.source: [Disallowing garbage collection](#NoGCRegion)
trans-unit.target: [不允許記憶體回收](#NoGCRegion)

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector and unmanaged resources
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程和 unmanaged 的資源

trans-unit.source: During a collection, the garbage collector will not free an object if it finds one or more references to the object in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 在回收期間，記憶體回收行程不會釋放物件如果 managed 程式碼中發現一個或多個物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: However, the garbage collector does not recognize references to an object from unmanaged code, and might free objects that are being used exclusively in unmanaged code unless explicitly prevented from doing so.
trans-unit.target: 不過，記憶體回收行程無法辨識從 unmanaged 程式碼中，物件的參考，而且可能釋放物件，除非明確地防止這樣使用 unmanaged 程式碼中以獨佔方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A> method provides a mechanism that prevents the garbage collector from collecting objects that are still in use in unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A>方法提供一套機制，可以防止記憶體回收行程收集的物件仍在使用 unmanaged 程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Aside from managed memory allocations, implementations of the garbage collector do not maintain information about resources held by an object, such as file handles or database connections.
trans-unit.target: 除了 managed 的記憶體配置的記憶體回收行程實作不會維護的物件，例如檔案控制代碼或資料庫連接所持有的資源的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: When a type uses unmanaged resources that must be released before instances of the type are reclaimed, the type can implement a finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 當型別使用的 unmanaged 的資源，必須釋放回收的類型執行個體之前時，類型可以實作完成項。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, finalizers are implemented by overriding the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method; however, types written in C# or C++ implement destructors, which compilers turn into an override of <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，完成項會實作覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法; 不過，撰寫 C# 或 c + + 中的類型實作解構函式的編譯器將轉換的覆寫成<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if an object has a finalizer, the garbage collector calls it prior to freeing the object.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果物件具有完成項中，記憶體回收行程呼叫它之前釋出物件。

trans-unit.source: However, the garbage collector is not required to call finalizers in all situations; for example, the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method explicitly prevents an object's finalizer from being called.
trans-unit.target: 不過，記憶體回收行程不需要在所有情況下，呼叫完成項例如，<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法明確地防止物件的完成項呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Also, the garbage collector is not required to use a specific thread to finalize objects, or guarantee the order in which finalizers are called for objects that reference each other but are otherwise available for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 此外，記憶體回收行程不需要使用特定的執行緒，以便最終處理物件，保證彼此參考，但可進行記憶體回收的物件呼叫完成項的順序。

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where resources must be released at a specific time, classes can implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface, which contains the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that performs resource management and cleanup tasks.
trans-unit.target: 在特定時間必須釋放資源的情況下，類別可以實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，其中包含<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，執行資源管理和清除工作。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> must specify, as part of their class contract, if and when class consumers call the method to clean up the object.
trans-unit.target: 類別可實作<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>必須指定，做為其類別合約的一部分時類別取用者呼叫方法，以清除物件。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not, by default, call the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method; however, implementations of the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method can call methods in the <xref:System.GC> class to customize the finalization behavior of the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程不會根據預設，呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法; 不過，實作<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法可以呼叫方法中<xref:System.GC>類別來自訂記憶體回收行程的最終處理行為。

trans-unit.source: For more information on object finalization and the dispose pattern, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關物件最終處理和 dispose 模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Object aging and generations
trans-unit.target: 物件的過時和層代

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector in the common language runtime supports object aging using generations.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 在記憶體回收行程支援物件使用的層代的時效性。

trans-unit.source: A generation is a unit of measure of the relative age of objects in memory.
trans-unit.target: 層代是測量的記憶體中物件的相對存在時間單位。

trans-unit.source: The generation number, or age, of an object indicates the generation to which an object belongs.
trans-unit.target: 層代編號或年齡物件表示物件所屬的層代。

trans-unit.source: Objects created more recently are part of newer generations, and have lower generation numbers than objects created earlier in the application life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 建立多個物件最近是較新的層代的一部分，而且具有小於物件先前在應用程式生命週期的層代編號。

trans-unit.source: Objects in the most recent generation are in generation 0.
trans-unit.target: 層代 0 中，是最新的層代中的物件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the garbage collector supports three generations of objects, generations 0, 1, and 2.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程的這項實作支援三個層代的物件，這些層代 0、 1 和 2。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property to determine the maximum generation number supported by the system.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取的值<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性，以判斷系統所支援的最大層代編號。

trans-unit.source: Object aging allows applications to target garbage collection at a specific set of generations rather than requiring the garbage collector to evaluate all generations.
trans-unit.target: 物件的時效性允許目標回收應用程式，在一組特定的層代，而不是需要評估所有層代記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method that include a `generation` parameter allow you to specify the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法包含`generation`參數可讓您指定要進行記憶體回收的最舊層代。

trans-unit.source: Disallowing garbage collection
trans-unit.target: 不允許記憶體回收

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the garbage collector supports a no GC region latency mode that can be used during the execution of critical paths in which garbage collection can adversely affect an app's performance.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，記憶體回收行程支援無 GC 區域延遲模式，可以在記憶體回收的集合可以有負面影響的應用程式效能的關鍵路徑的執行期間使用。

trans-unit.source: The no GC region latency mode requires that you specify an amount of memory that can be allocated without interference from the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 無 GC 區域延遲模式需要您指定可從記憶體回收行程配置不受干擾的記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime can allocate that memory, the runtime will not perform a garbage collection while code in the critical path is executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段可以配置的記憶體，執行階段不會執行回收時執行的關鍵路徑中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You define the beginning of the critical path of the no GC region by calling one of the overloads of the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您透過呼叫其中一個多載定義的無 GC 區域的關鍵路徑的開頭<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You specify the end of its critical path by calling the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定其關鍵路徑的結尾呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses several GC methods to get generation and memory information about a block of unused objects and print it to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用數個 GC 方法，以取得產生和記憶體未使用物件的區塊資訊並列印到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The unused objects are then collected, and the resulting memory totals are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然後會回收未使用的物件，而且會顯示產生的記憶體總數。

trans-unit.source: The incremental amount of unmanaged memory that has been allocated.
trans-unit.target: 已配置的 Unmanaged 記憶體累加數量。

trans-unit.source: Informs the runtime of a large allocation of unmanaged memory that should be taken into account when scheduling garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 告知執行階段，在排定記憶體回收時應考慮的大量 Unmanaged 記憶體配置。

trans-unit.source: In determining when to schedule garbage collection, the runtime takes into account how much managed memory is allocated.
trans-unit.target: 在決定何時要排定記憶體回收時，執行階段會考量已配置的受管理的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: If a small managed object allocates a large amount of unmanaged memory, the runtime takes into account only the managed memory, and thus underestimates the urgency of scheduling garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果小型的 managed 的物件會配置大量的未受管理的記憶體，執行階段會考量只有受管理的記憶體，並因此低估排定記憶體回收的急迫性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> method informs the runtime of this additional pressure on system memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>方法告知執行階段，此額外系統記憶體不足。

trans-unit.source: In the simplest usage pattern, a managed object allocates unmanaged memory in the constructor and releases it in the `Dispose` or `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 在最簡單的使用方式模式中，受管理的物件配置 unmanaged 的記憶體中的建構函式，並釋放它在`Dispose`或`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> method after allocating the unmanaged memory, and call the <xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A> method after releasing it.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>方法之後配置 unmanaged 的記憶體中，並呼叫<xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A>之後釋出它的方法。

trans-unit.source: In more complicated scenarios, where the unmanaged memory allocation changes substantially during the lifetime of the managed object, you can call the <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> and <xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A> methods to communicate these incremental changes to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在更複雜的情況，其中 unmanaged 的記憶體配置的 managed 物件的存留期間變更本質上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>和<xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A>通訊這些執行階段的累加變更的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must ensure that you remove exactly the amount of pressure you add.
trans-unit.target: 您必須確定您移除完全壓力您新增的數量。

trans-unit.source: Failing to do so can adversely affect the performance of the system in applications that run for long periods of time.
trans-unit.target: 不這樣做的話，可能會影響系統的長時間執行的應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> 小於或等於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
On a 32-bit computer, <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 32 位元電腦上，<paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code when manipulating garbage-collection priority.
trans-unit.target: 提供管理回收優先順序時，呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the registration of a garbage collection notification.
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊記憶體回收通知。

trans-unit.source: This method cancels a garbage collection notification that was registered by using the <xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取消，使用已註冊記憶體回收通知<xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to call this method before adjusting threshold parameter values in subsequent calls to the <xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要調整臨界值參數值在後續呼叫之前呼叫這個方法<xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example cancels a garbage collection registration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取消註冊記憶體回收集合。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the [Garbage Collection Notifications](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分[記憶體回收通知](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: This member is not available when concurrent garbage collection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用並行記憶體回收時，無法使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: See the [<gcConcurrent>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcconcurrent-element.md) runtime setting for information about how to disable concurrent garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何停用並行記憶體回收的資訊，請參閱 [<gcConcurrent>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcconcurrent-element.md) 執行階段設定。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Forces garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 強制記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Forces an immediate garbage collection of all generations.
trans-unit.target: 強制立即執行所有層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to try to reclaim all memory that is inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，嘗試回收所有無法存取的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: It performs a blocking garbage collection of all generations.
trans-unit.target: 它會執行所有層代的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: All objects, regardless of how long they have been in memory, are considered for collection; however, objects that are referenced in managed code are not collected.
trans-unit.target: 所有的物件，不論多久已在記憶體中，會被視為集合;不過，不會收集 managed 程式碼中所參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to force the system to try to reclaim the maximum amount of available memory.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來強制系統嘗試回收的最大可用記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can compact the large object heap (LOH) by setting the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType> before calling the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]，您可以藉由設定壓縮大型物件堆積 (LOH)<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前先呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法，如下列範例會說明。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method to perform a collection on all generations of memory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法執行所有層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The code generates a number of unused objects, and then calls the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method to clean them from memory.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會產生未使用的物件數目，然後呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法來從記憶體清除它們。

trans-unit.source: The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 要進行記憶體回收的最舊層代數目。

trans-unit.source: Forces an immediate garbage collection from generation 0 through a specified generation.
trans-unit.target: 強制立即執行層代 0 至指定層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to try to reclaim memory that is inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 再試一次回收記憶體而無法使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: However, using this method does not guarantee that all inaccessible memory in the specified generation is reclaimed.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用此方法不保證會回收所有存取的記憶體中指定的層代。

trans-unit.source: If object aging is implemented, the garbage collector does not collect objects with a generation number that is higher than the specified generation.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的時效性實作時，記憶體回收行程無法回收物件以產生數字高於指定層代。

trans-unit.source: If object aging is not implemented, the garbage collector considers all objects during the garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 未實作物件的時效性，如果記憶體回收行程會考慮在記憶體回收期間的所有物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property to determine the maximum valid value of the `generation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性來判斷最大有效值`generation`參數。

trans-unit.source: To have the garbage collector consider all objects regardless of their generation, use the version of this method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要考慮所有的物件，不論其層代記憶體回收行程，請使用這個方法不採用參數的版本。

trans-unit.source: To have the garbage collector reclaim objects based on a <xref:System.GCCollectionMode> setting, use the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要將記憶體回收行程回收物件根據<xref:System.GCCollectionMode>設定，請使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method to perform a collection on individual layers of memory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>執行回收的記憶體的個別圖層上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The code generates a number of unused objects, and then calls the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method to clean them from memory.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會產生未使用的物件數目，然後呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法來從記憶體清除它們。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="generation" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="generation" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 要進行記憶體回收的最舊層代數目。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies whether the garbage collection is forced (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> or <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) or optimized (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />).
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定是要強制記憶體回收 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) 還是進行最佳化 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />)。

trans-unit.source: Forces a garbage collection from generation 0 through a specified generation, at a time specified by a <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> 值所指定的時間，強制執行層代 0 至指定層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Use the `mode` parameter to specify whether garbage collection should occur immediately or only if the time is optimal to reclaim objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用`mode`參數來指定是否應該發生記憶體回收立即] 或 [僅時間是否最佳回收物件。

trans-unit.source: Using this method does not guarantee that all inaccessible memory in the specified generation is reclaimed.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法不保證會回收所有存取的記憶體中指定的層代。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the intrusiveness of garbage collection during critical periods in your application, set the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LatencyMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整應用程式中的重大期間記憶體回收的干擾程度，請設定<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LatencyMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not collect objects with a generation number higher than specified by the `generation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程不會收集以產生數字高於所指定的物件`generation`參數。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property to determine the maximum valid value of `generation`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性來判斷最大有效值`generation`。

trans-unit.source: To have the garbage collector consider all objects regardless of their generation, use the version of this method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要考慮所有的物件，不論其層代記憶體回收行程，請使用這個方法不採用參數的版本。

trans-unit.source: To have the garbage collector reclaim objects up to a specified generation of objects, use the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓記憶體回收行程回收最多指定物件層代的物件，請使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the maximum generation, all objects are collected.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定最大層代時，則會收集所有物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example forces a garbage collection for generation 2 objects with the <xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized> setting.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例強制執行記憶體回收層代 2 物件<xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized>設定。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="generation" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="generation" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="mode" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 要進行記憶體回收的最舊層代數目。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies whether the garbage collection is forced (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> or <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) or optimized (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />).
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定是要強制記憶體回收 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) 還是進行最佳化 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform a blocking garbage collection; <see langword="false" /> to perform a background garbage collection where possible.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要執行封鎖記憶體回收，<see langword="false" /> 表示要盡可能執行背景記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Forces a garbage collection from generation 0 through a specified generation, at a time specified by a <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> value, with a value specifying whether the collection should be blocking.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> 值 (含有指定是否應該封鎖回收作業的值) 所指定的時間，強制執行從層代 0 到指定之層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the interaction of the `mode` and `blocking` parameters:
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明之間的互動`mode`和`blocking`參數：

trans-unit.source: `blocking` is `true`
trans-unit.target: `blocking` 是 `true`

trans-unit.source: `blocking` is `false`
trans-unit.target: `blocking` 是 `false`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced> or <xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Default>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced> 或 <xref:System.GCCollectionMode.Default>

trans-unit.source: A blocking collection is performed as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 會盡快執行封鎖回收。

trans-unit.source: If a background collection is in progress and `generation` is 0 or 1, the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method immediately triggers a blocking collection and returns when the collection is finished.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在進行中的背景集合和`generation`是 0 或 1，<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法立即觸發封鎖的集合，並在完成集合後傳回。

trans-unit.source: If a background collection is in progress and `generation` is 2, the method waits until the background collection is finished, triggers a blocking generation 2 collection, and then returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在進行中的背景集合和`generation`為 2，則方法會等候直到背景回收完成時，封鎖的層代 2 回收，觸發程序，然後傳回。

trans-unit.source: A collection is performed as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 會盡快執行回收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method requests a background collection, but this is not guaranteed; depending on the circumstances, a blocking collection may still be performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 方法會要求背景集合，但不保證可取得。視情況而定，可能仍會執行封鎖集合。

trans-unit.source: If a background collection is already in progress, the method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在進行背景回收，則這個方法會立即返回。

trans-unit.source: A blocking collection may be performed, depending on the state of the garbage collector and the `generation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可能會因記憶體回收行程和 `generation` 參數的狀態而執行封鎖集合。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector tries to provide optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會嘗試提供最佳效能。

trans-unit.source: A collection may be performed, depending on the state of the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 根據記憶體回收行程的狀態，可能會執行回收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method requests a background collection, but this is not guaranteed; depending on the circumstances, a blocking collection may still be performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 方法會要求背景集合，但不保證可取得。視情況而定，可能仍會執行封鎖集合。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector tries to provide optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會嘗試提供最佳效能。

trans-unit.source: If a background collection is already in progress, the method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在進行背景回收，則這個方法會立即返回。

trans-unit.source: If a call to the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method performs a full blocking garbage collection, you can also compact the large object heap by setting the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType> before calling the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法會執行完全封鎖記憶體回收，您也可以藉由設定壓縮大型物件堆積<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前先呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="generation" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="generation" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="mode" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The number of the oldest generation to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 要進行記憶體回收的最舊層代數目。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies whether the garbage collection is forced (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> or <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) or optimized (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />).
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定是要強制記憶體回收 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Default" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Forced" />) 還是進行最佳化 (<see cref="F:System.GCCollectionMode.Optimized" />)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform a blocking garbage collection; <see langword="false" /> to perform a background garbage collection where possible.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要執行封鎖記憶體回收，<see langword="false" /> 表示要盡可能執行背景記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to compact the small object heap; <see langword="false" /> to sweep only.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示壓縮小型物件堆積；<see langword="false" /> 表示僅整理。

trans-unit.source: Forces a garbage collection from generation 0 through a specified generation, at a time specified by a <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> value, with values that specify whether the collection should be blocking and compacting.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.GCCollectionMode" /> 值 (含有指定是否應該封鎖及壓縮回收作業的值) 所指定的時間，強制執行從層代 0 到指定之層代的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: If `blocking` is `false`, the GC decides whether to perform a background or a blocking garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`blocking`是`false`，GC 會決定是否要執行的背景或封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: If `compacting` is `true`, it performs a blocking garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`compacting`是`true`，它會執行封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: If `compacting` is `true`, the runtime compacts the small object heap (SOH).
trans-unit.target: 如果`compacting`是`true`，執行階段會壓縮小型物件堆積 (SOH)。

trans-unit.source: The large object heap (LOH) is not compacted unless the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to <xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非，不會壓縮大型物件堆積 (LOH)<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為<xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this includes all blocking garbage collections, not just full blocking garbage collections.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這包含所有封鎖記憶體回收，不只完整封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to reduce the managed heap to the smallest size possible, as the following code fragment illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法，以減少受管理的堆積大小最小，如下列程式碼片段所示。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `true` for the `compacting` argument guarantees a compacting, full blocking garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定`true`如`compacting`引數可保證壓縮、 完整封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType> ensures that both the LOH and SOH are compacted.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Runtime.GCSettings.LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Runtime.GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode.CompactOnce?displayProperty=nameWithType>可確保會壓縮 LOH 與 SOH。

trans-unit.source: The generation of objects for which the garbage collection count is to be determined.
trans-unit.target: 要判斷記憶體回收計數的物件層代。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of times garbage collection has occurred for the specified generation of objects.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件層代已發生記憶體回收的次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of times garbage collection has occurred for the specified generation since the process was started.
trans-unit.target: 自從啟動處理程序之後，指定層代已發生記憶體回收的次數。

trans-unit.source: If you implement your own resource management, you might need to force garbage collection periodically by calling the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作您自己的資源管理，您可能需要定期強制記憶體回收，藉由呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because this is an expensive operation, you can improve performance by skipping the call when a garbage collection has occurred recently.
trans-unit.target: 因為這是昂貴的作業，您可以藉由略過呼叫時最近發生記憶體回收改善效能。

trans-unit.source: Save the value returned by <xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A> immediately after calling <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 儲存所傳回的值<xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A>後立即呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The next time you need to call <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>, compare the current value returned by <xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A> to the saved value.
trans-unit.target: 您需要呼叫在下一次<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>，所傳回的目前值相比較<xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A>已儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: If the two values are equal, no collection has occurred in the interim and it is reasonable to call <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個值相等，過渡中發生任何集合，而且很合理地呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>一次。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="generation" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="generation" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Ends the no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 結束無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the garbage collector is not in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果記憶體回收行程不處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: This occurs under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 發生這種情況下下列任何一個狀況：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method was not called previously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>不先前呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method returned `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method threw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent an exception for any of these reasons by using code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用程式碼如下所示，基於這些原因避免例外狀況：

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector is not in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程不在無 GC 區域延遲模式下。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The no GC region latency mode was ended previously because a garbage collection was induced.
trans-unit.target: 無 GC 區域延遲模式之前已結束，因為已包含記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A memory allocation exceeded the amount specified in the call to the <see cref="M:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion(System.Int64)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體配置超過 <see cref="M:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion(System.Int64)" /> 方法呼叫中所指定的數量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current generation number of an object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的目前層代編號。

trans-unit.source: The object that generation information is retrieved for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取層代資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current generation number of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件的目前層代編號。

trans-unit.source: The current generation number of <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 的目前層代編號。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the age of an object, and then use that information with the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method to force the garbage collector to collect objects in the same generation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷物件的存留期，然後使用該資訊與<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>相同的層代中的方法，以強制記憶體回收行程回收物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, use this method when you have a set of objects that are created as a group and that become inaccessible at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您有一組群組所建立的並且在相同的時間，變成無法存取的物件時，才能使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.GetGeneration%2A> method to determine the age of an object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.GetGeneration%2A>方法，以判斷物件的存留期。

trans-unit.source: The example then performs garbage collections to clean up memory and compare the pre and post collection memory totals in the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會執行記憶體回收集合來清除記憶體並比較預先張貼集合在主控台中的記憶體總數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.WeakReference" /> that refers to the target object whose generation number is to be determined.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.WeakReference" />，參考要判斷層代編號的目標物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current generation number of the target of a specified weak reference.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定弱式參考之目標的目前層代編號。

trans-unit.source: The current generation number of the target of <paramref name="wo" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="wo" /> 之目標的目前層代編號。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.GC.GetGeneration%2A> method to determine the age of a weak reference object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.GetGeneration%2A>方法，以判斷最弱式參考物件的時間。

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection has already been performed on <paramref name="wo" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="wo" /> 上已執行記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this method can wait for garbage collection to occur before returning; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法可以等待記憶體回收發生後再傳回則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of bytes currently thought to be allocated.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前被視為已配置的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: A parameter indicates whether this method can wait a short interval before returning, to allow the system to collect garbage and finalize objects.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指出這個方法是否可以先等待短暫間隔後再傳回，以便讓系統回收記憶體和最終處理物件。

trans-unit.source: A number that is the best available approximation of the number of bytes currently allocated in managed memory.
trans-unit.target: 數目，為目前配置於 Managed 記憶體中位元組的最佳可用近似數目。

trans-unit.source: If the `forceFullCollection` parameter is `true`, this method waits a short interval before returning while the system collects garbage and finalizes objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果`forceFullCollection`參數是`true`，這個方法會等候再傳回較短的間隔時，系統會收集記憶體回收，並終結物件。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval is an internally specified limit determined by the number of garbage collection cycles completed and the change in the amount of memory recovered between cycles.
trans-unit.target: 內部指定的限制，取決於已完成記憶體回收週期數目和復原循環之間的記憶體變更間隔的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not guarantee that all inaccessible memory is collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程不保證會收集所有存取的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.GetTotalMemory%2A> method to get and display the number of bytes currently allocated in managed memory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.GetTotalMemory%2A>方法來取得並顯示目前配置於 managed 記憶體中的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: References the specified object, which makes it ineligible for garbage collection from the start of the current routine to the point where this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 參考指定的物件，使它從目前常式的開始至呼叫這個方法時都不適合記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A> method is to ensure the existence of a reference to an object that is at risk of being prematurely reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 目的<xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A>方法是確保可能過早被記憶體回收行程回收物件的參考是否存在。

trans-unit.source: A common scenario where this might happen is when there are no references to the object in managed code or data, but the object is still in use in unmanaged code such as Win32 APIs, unmanaged DLLs, or methods using COM.
trans-unit.target: 這其中可能會發生的常見案例是當沒有物件參考 managed 程式碼或資料，但物件仍在使用 unmanaged 程式碼，例如 Win32 Api，unmanaged Dll，或使用 COM 方法

trans-unit.source: This method references the `obj` parameter, making that object ineligible for garbage collection from the start of the routine to the point, in execution order, where this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所參考`obj`參數，使該物件適合記憶體回收從常式的開始點，以執行順序，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Code this method at the end, not the beginning, of the range of instructions where `obj` must be available.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在結束時，無法開始時，指示的範圍的程式碼位置`obj`必須可供使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A> method performs no operation and produces no side effects other than extending the lifetime of the object passed in as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A>方法會執行任何作業，並產生沒有副作用以外延伸做為參數傳遞的物件的存留期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an object at the beginning of its `Main` method and does not refer to the object again until the end, when the <xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立物件的開頭其`Main`方法，而且不會一次，直到結束時，無法參考物件時<xref:System.GC.KeepAlive%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The object persists for the 30-second duration of the `Main` method, despite calls to the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> and <xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 30 秒期間的物件保存`Main`方法，儘管呼叫<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>和<xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of generations that the system currently supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得系統目前支援的最大層代編號。

trans-unit.source: A value that ranges from zero to the maximum number of supported generations.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從零至所支援最大層代編號的值。

trans-unit.source: The generation number, or age, of an object is an implementation-defined relative measure of an object's lifespan.
trans-unit.target: 層代編號或年齡，物件會實作定義相對量值物件的使用期限。

trans-unit.source: The most recently created objects are in generation 0 and the oldest objects are in a generation less than or equal to the generation returned by the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 最新建立的物件是層代 0 中，最舊的物件是小於或等於產生傳回的層代<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector assumes that newer memory is more likely to be eligible for garbage collection than older memory.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會假設較新的記憶體是比較可能是較舊的記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the garbage collector improves its performance by adjusting generation numbers each time it reclaims memory, and the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property value can grow over time.
trans-unit.target: 因此，記憶體回收行程會改善其效能調整它會回收記憶體，每次產生數字和<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性值可以隨著時間成長。

trans-unit.source: If object aging is implemented, the <xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A> property returns the maximum generation number used by the system; otherwise, this property returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作物件的時效性，<xref:System.GC.MaxGeneration%2A>屬性會傳回系統所使用的最大層代編號，否則這個屬性會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the MaxGeneration property to display the largest generation number currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用 MaxGeneration 屬性來使用目前顯示的最大層代編號。

trans-unit.source: For this implementation, the value returned by the <see cref="P:System.GC.MaxGeneration" /> property is guaranteed to remain constant for the lifetime of an executing application.
trans-unit.target: 此實作中，傳回的值由<see cref="P:System.GC.MaxGeneration" />屬性會保證執行的應用程式的存留期間保持不變。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.GC.MaxGeneration" /> property to determine the maximum value you can specify when calling the <see cref="M:System.GC.Collect(System.Int32)" /> method that takes a generation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<see cref="P:System.GC.MaxGeneration" />屬性來判斷呼叫時，您可以指定的最大值<see cref="M:System.GC.Collect(System.Int32)" />採用產生參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: A number between 1 and 99 that specifies when the notification should be raised based on the objects allocated in generation 2.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 1 到 99 的數字，指定何時應根據層代 2 中所配置的物件加以引發通知。

trans-unit.source: A number between 1 and 99 that specifies when the notification should be raised based on objects allocated in the large object heap.
trans-unit.target: 範圍從 1 到 99 的數字，指定何時根據大型物件堆積中所配置的物件加以引發通知。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a garbage collection notification should be raised when conditions favor full garbage collection and when the collection has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 指定當情況需要完整記憶體回收時和回收完成時，應引發記憶體回收通知。

trans-unit.source: For each generation, the garbage collector sets a threshold for allocations into that generation.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個層代中，記憶體回收行程會設定成該層代的配置臨界值。

trans-unit.source: When the size of allocations exceeds this threshold, a garbage collection is triggered on that generation.
trans-unit.target: 當配置的記憶體大小超過此臨界值時，該層代上觸發記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For example, if generation 2’s threshold is 20MB (which means that 20MB survives generation 1 collections and is promoted into generation 2), and more than 20MB has survived generation 1 and is prompted into generation 2, the next garbage collection will be attempted as a generation 2 collection.
trans-unit.target: 如範例中，如果層代 2 的臨界值是 20 MB （亦即未層代 1 回收 20 MB，並提升至層代 2），超過 20 MB 尚未被第 1 代，而且會提示輸入至層代 2 中，將會嘗試下一個記憶體回收為層代 2 回收。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the large object heap's (LOH's) threshold is 20MB and your app has allocated more than 20MB of large objects, the next garbage collection will also be attempted as a generation 2 collection (since the LOH is only collected in gen2 garbage collections).
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果大型物件堆積 (LOH) 臨界值是 20 MB，您的應用程式有已配置超過 20 MB 的大型物件下, 一個記憶體回收也會嘗試為層代 2 回收 （因為，gen2 記憶體回收中才會收集 LOH）。

trans-unit.source: The `maxGenerationThreshold` and `largeObjectHeapThreshold` thresholds control how much in advance you are notified before a full garbage collection occurs.
trans-unit.target: `maxGenerationThreshold`和`largeObjectHeapThreshold`臨界值會控制多少事先通知您完整記憶體回收發生之前。

trans-unit.source: The greater the threshold, the more allocations that can occur between notification and the next full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 閾值愈通知和下一個完整記憶體回收之間可能的多個配置。

trans-unit.source: If you have situations in which a full garbage collection by the common language runtime would adversely affect your application's performance, you can ask to be notified when the runtime is about to do a full garbage collection and circumvent that collection by inducing a collection yourself (using the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method) when conditions are still favorable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在其中完整回收，common language runtime 會影響您的應用程式效能的情況下，您可以要求執行完整記憶體回收和規避該集合，由執行階段時收到通知自行引發集合 (使用<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法) 時仍理想狀況。

trans-unit.source: In addition to changing the garbage collection schedule yourself, full GC notification is useful in following the scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 除了變更自己的記憶體回收集合排程，完整 GC 通知適用於下列案例：

trans-unit.source: You monitor for the approach of a full garbage collection and, when you are notified that one is approaching, you reduce live data size (for example, by releasing some cache entries).
trans-unit.target: 您進行監視的完整記憶體回收的方法，當系統通知您其中一個已接近，您縮小即時資料 （例如，藉由釋放某些快取項目）。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the garbage collection occurs, it is able to reclaim more memory.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，當記憶體回收發生時，便能將回收更多記憶體。

trans-unit.source: You monitor for the completion of a full garbage collection so that you can collect some statistics.
trans-unit.target: 您監視的完整記憶體回收完成，而您可以收集一些統計資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to measure the size of the heap at GC completion so that you know the size of live data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以測量在 GC 完成堆積的大小，好讓您知道即時資料的大小。

trans-unit.source: (After a full GC, the heap is at its smallest size.)
trans-unit.target: （完整的 GC，堆積之後的最小大小。）

trans-unit.source: For more information about what represents a full garbage collection, see [Garbage Collection Notifications](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼代表完整記憶體回收的詳細資訊，請參閱[記憶體回收通知](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you register for a garbage collection notification, you can be notified when a full garbage collection is approaching and when it is completed.
trans-unit.target: 當您註冊記憶體回收通知時，接近完整記憶體回收時和完成時，則會通知您可以。

trans-unit.source: This pattern resembles how the operating system monitors for low memory notifications.
trans-unit.target: 此模式類似於如何作業系統用來監視記憶體不足的通知。

trans-unit.source: Use the following guidelines for specifying the `maxGenerationThreshold` and `largeObjectHeapThreshold` parameters:
trans-unit.target: 使用下列指導方針來指定`maxGenerationThreshold`和`largeObjectHeapThreshold`參數：

trans-unit.source: The larger the threshold value, the more allocations will occur between the notification and the full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值越大，更多的配置會通知與完整記憶體回收之間發生。

trans-unit.source: A larger threshold value provides more opportunities for the runtime to check for an approaching collection.
trans-unit.target: 較大的臨界值會提供更多的機會，為了讓執行階段檢查接近的集合。

trans-unit.source: This increases the likelihood that you will be notified.
trans-unit.target: 這會增加，系統會通知您的可能性。

trans-unit.source: However, you should not set the threshold too high because that results in a more allocations before the runtime induces the next collection.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您不應該設定過高臨界值，因為這樣會造成更多的配置之前執行階段產生的下一個集合。

trans-unit.source: When you induce a collection yourself upon notification using a high threshold value, fewer objects are reclaimed than would be reclaimed by the runtime's next collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您自行引發回收告知使用高臨界值時，會由執行階段的下一次回收收回比回收較少的物件。

trans-unit.source: The smaller the threshold value, the fewer the allocations between notification and the full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 小臨界值，較少通知與完整記憶體回收之間配置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to register a garbage collection notification and start a thread to monitor the status of the garbage collection notification.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何註冊記憶體回收通知並啟動執行緒來監視記憶體回收通知的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for [Garbage Collection Notifications](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分[記憶體回收通知](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="maxGenerationThreshold" /> or <paramref name="largeObjectHeapThreshold" /> is not between 1 and 99.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxGenerationThreshold" /> 或 <paramref name="largeObjectHeapThreshold" /> 未介於 1 和 99 之間。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The amount of unmanaged memory that has been released.
trans-unit.target: 已釋放的 Unmanaged 記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: Informs the runtime that unmanaged memory has been released and no longer needs to be taken into account when scheduling garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 告知執行階段，Unmanaged 記憶體已釋放，所以排定記憶體回收時不需要再考慮它。

trans-unit.source: In determining when to schedule garbage collection, the runtime takes into account how much managed memory is allocated.
trans-unit.target: 在決定何時要排定記憶體回收時，執行階段會考量已配置的受管理的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: If a small managed object allocates a large amount of unmanaged memory, the runtime takes into account only the managed memory, and thus underestimates the urgency of scheduling garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果小型的 managed 的物件會配置大量的未受管理的記憶體，執行階段會考量只有受管理的記憶體，並因此低估排定記憶體回收的急迫性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> method informs the runtime of this additional pressure on system memory, and the <xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A> method informs the runtime that the additional pressure has been released.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>方法告知執行階段，系統記憶體，此額外的壓力而<xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A>方法會通知執行階段已釋放額外的壓力。

trans-unit.source: In the simplest usage pattern, a managed object allocates unmanaged memory in the constructor and releases it in the `Dispose` or `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 在最簡單的使用方式模式中，受管理的物件配置 unmanaged 的記憶體中的建構函式，並釋放它在`Dispose`或`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> method after allocating the unmanaged memory, and call the <xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A> method after releasing it.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>方法之後配置 unmanaged 的記憶體中，並呼叫<xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A>之後釋出它的方法。

trans-unit.source: In more complicated scenarios, where the unmanaged memory allocation changes substantially during the lifetime of the managed object, you can call the <xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A> and <xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A> methods to communicate these incremental changes to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在更複雜的情況，其中 unmanaged 的記憶體配置的 managed 物件的存留期間變更本質上，您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.AddMemoryPressure%2A>和<xref:System.GC.RemoveMemoryPressure%2A>通訊這些執行階段的累加變更的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must ensure that you remove exactly the amount of pressure you add.
trans-unit.target: 您必須確定您移除完全壓力您新增的數量。

trans-unit.source: Failing to do so can adversely affect the performance of the system in applications that run for long periods of time.
trans-unit.target: 不這樣做的話，可能會影響系統的長時間執行的應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> 小於或等於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
On a 32-bit computer, <paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 32 位元電腦上，<paramref name="bytesAllocated" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code when manipulating garbage-collection priority.
trans-unit.target: 提供管理回收優先順序時，呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The object that a finalizer must be called for.
trans-unit.target: 必須呼叫完成項的物件。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the system call the finalizer for the specified object for which <see cref="M:System.GC.SuppressFinalize(System.Object)" /> has previously been called.
trans-unit.target: 要求系統為指定物件 (先前已經為其呼叫 <see cref="M:System.GC.SuppressFinalize(System.Object)" />) 呼叫完成項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.ReRegisterForFinalize%2A> method adds the `obj` parameter to the list of objects that request finalization before the garbage collector frees the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.ReRegisterForFinalize%2A>方法會將`obj`參數的記憶體回收行程釋放物件之前，要求最終處理的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: The `obj` parameter must be the caller of this method.
trans-unit.target: `obj`參數必須是這個方法的呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.GC.ReRegisterForFinalize%2A> method does not guarantee that the garbage collector will call an object's finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.GC.ReRegisterForFinalize%2A>方法不保證記憶體回收行程會呼叫物件的完成項。

trans-unit.source: By default, all objects that implement finalizers are added to the list of objects that require finalization; however, an object might have already been finalized or might have disabled finalization by calling the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會實作完成項的所有物件都加入至所需的最終處理; 的物件清單不過，物件可能已完成，或可能已停用最終處理藉由呼叫<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A finalizer can use this method to resurrect itself or an object that it references.
trans-unit.target: 完成項可以使用這個方法重新恢復它本身或它所參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the ReRegisterForFinalize method to finalize an object a second time after garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 ReRegisterForFinalize 方法來完成第二個物件在回收之後的時間。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object whose finalizer must not be executed.
trans-unit.target: 完成項不得執行的物件。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the common language runtime not call the finalizer for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 要求 Common Language Runtime 不要為指定之物件呼叫完成項。

trans-unit.source: This method sets a bit in the object header of `obj`, which the runtime checks when calling finalizers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定位元的物件標頭中`obj`，當呼叫完成項，執行階段檢查。

trans-unit.source: A finalizer, which is represented by the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, is used to release unmanaged resources before an object is garbage-collected.
trans-unit.target: 完成項，它由<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，用於物件被記憶體回收前釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: If `obj` does not have a finalizer, the call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果`obj`沒有完成項中，呼叫<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Objects that implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface can call this method from the object's <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation to prevent the garbage collector from calling <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on an object that does not require it.
trans-unit.target: 物件，實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面可以呼叫這個方法的物件從<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作，以防止記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上不需要的物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is done to prevent the finalizer from releasing unmanaged resources that have already been freed by the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這為了釋放已釋放的 unmanaged 的資源時，防止完成項<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>實作。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method in a resource class to prevent a redundant garbage collection from being called.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>中的資源類別，以避免多餘的記憶體回收集合時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the [dispose pattern](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md) to free both managed resources (that is, objects that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>) and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用[處置模式](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md)同時釋放 managed 資源 (也就是物件，實作<xref:System.IDisposable>) 與 unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to disallow garbage collection during the execution of a critical path.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在執行關鍵路徑期間，禁止記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory in bytes to allocate without triggering a garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在不觸發記憶體回收的情況下，要配置的記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: It must be less than or equal to the size of an ephemeral segment.
trans-unit.target: 該值必須小於或等於暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: For information on the size of an ephemeral segment, see the "Ephemeral generations and segments" section in the [Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md) article.
trans-unit.target: 如需暫時區段大小的資訊，請參閱[記憶體回收的基本概念](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md)一文中的＜暫時層代和區段＞一節。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to disallow garbage collection during the execution of a critical path if a specified amount of memory is available.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在有指定數量記憶體可用時，於執行關鍵路徑期間，禁止記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the runtime was able to commit the required amount of memory and the garbage collector is able to enter no GC region latency mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段可以認可所需的記憶體數量且記憶體回收行程可以進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%29> method attempts to place the garbage collector in no GC region latency mode, which disallows garbage collection while an app executes a critical region of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%29>方法會嘗試將記憶體回收行程中不允許記憶體回收，而應用程式執行的程式碼的重要區域無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime is unable to initially allocate the requested amount of memory, the garbage collector performs a full blocking garbage collection in an attempt to free additional memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段無法一開始配置要求的記憶體數量，記憶體回收行程會執行完全封鎖記憶體回收，嘗試釋放出額外的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector enters no GC region latency mode if it is able to allocate the required amount of memory, which in this case is actually 2 * `totalSize` bytes (it attempts to allocate `totalSize` bytes for the small object heap and `totalSize` bytes for the large object heap).
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，它是否能夠配置所需的數量的記憶體，在此情況下為實際 2 *`totalSize`位元組 (它會嘗試配置`totalSize`小型物件堆積位元組和`totalSize`針對大型物件堆積位元組)。

trans-unit.source: `totalSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path.
trans-unit.target: `totalSize` 必須要夠大，無法處理發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置。

trans-unit.source: This includes allocations by the app, as well as allocations that the runtime makes on the app's behalf.
trans-unit.target: 這包括應用程式時，所配置，以及執行階段可讓應用程式的代表的配置。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: You exit the no GC region latency mode by calling the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫結束無 GC 區域延遲模式<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="totalSize" /> exceeds the ephemeral segment size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="totalSize" /> 超過暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: The process is already in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理序處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory in bytes to allocate without triggering a garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在不觸發記憶體回收的情況下，要配置的記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: It must be less than or equal to the size of an ephemeral segment.
trans-unit.target: 該值必須小於或等於暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: For information on the size of an ephemeral segment, see the "Ephemeral generations and segments" section in the [Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md) article.
trans-unit.target: 如需暫時區段大小的資訊，請參閱[記憶體回收的基本概念](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md)一文中的＜暫時層代和區段＞一節。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to omit a full blocking garbage collection if the garbage collector is initially unable to allocate <c>totalSize</c> bytes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示如果記憶體回收行程最初無法配置 <c>totalSize</c> 個位元組，則省略完全封鎖記憶體回收；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to disallow garbage collection during the execution of a critical path if a specified amount of memory is available, and controls whether the garbage collector does a full blocking garbage collection if not enough memory is initially available.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在有指定數量記憶體可用時，於執行關鍵路徑期間，禁止記憶體回收，並控制在最初沒有足夠的記憶體可用時，記憶體回收行程是否執行完全封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the runtime was able to commit the required amount of memory and the garbage collector is able to enter no GC region latency mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段可以認可所需的記憶體數量且記憶體回收行程可以進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method attempts to place the garbage collector in no GC region latency mode, which disallows garbage collection while an app executes a critical region of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法會嘗試將記憶體回收行程中不允許記憶體回收，而應用程式執行的程式碼的重要區域無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime is unable to initially allocate the requested amount of memory and the `disallowFullBlockingGC` argument is `false`, the garbage collector performs a full blocking garbage collection in an attempt to free additional memory; otherwise, the allocation fails, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段是無法一開始配置要求的記憶體數量和`disallowFullBlockingGC`引數是`false`、 記憶體回收行程會嘗試釋放出額外的記憶體來執行完全封鎖記憶體回收; 否則，請配置失敗，而且方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector enters no GC region latency mode if it is able to allocate the required amount of memory, which in this case is actually 2 * `totalSize` (it attempts to allocate `totalSize` for the small object heap and `totalSize` for the large object heap).
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，它是否能夠配置所需的數量的記憶體，在此情況下為實際 2 * `totalSize` (它會嘗試配置`totalSize`針對小物件堆積和`totalSize`針對大型物件堆積)。

trans-unit.source: `totalSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path.
trans-unit.target: `totalSize` 必須要夠大，無法處理發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置。

trans-unit.source: This includes allocations by the app, as well as allocations that the runtime makes on the app's behalf.
trans-unit.target: 這包括應用程式時，所配置，以及執行階段可讓應用程式的代表的配置。

trans-unit.source: Setting `disallowFullBlockingGC` to `true` to prevent a full blocking garbage collection if not enough memory is initially available is most useful in load balancing scenarios: one system can call this method and report itself as ready to accept requests if it returns `true`, and have the load balancer redirect requests to other systems if it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定`disallowFullBlockingGC`至`true`為了避免完整的封鎖記憶體回收集合，如果沒有足夠的記憶體一開始是負載平衡案例中最為有用： 一個系統可以呼叫這個方法，並報告本身為準備好接受要求，如果它傳回`true`，而且如果它傳回，將要求重新導向至其他系統的負載平衡器`false`。

trans-unit.source: It can then do a full blocking garbage collection when it's not handling requests by calling the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 它不藉由呼叫處理要求時，它可以再執行完全封鎖記憶體回收<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: You exit the no GC region latency mode by calling the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫結束無 GC 區域延遲模式<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="totalSize" /> exceeds the ephemeral segment size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="totalSize" /> 超過暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: The process is already in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理序處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory in bytes to allocate without triggering a garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在不觸發記憶體回收的情況下，要配置的記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: <c>totalSize</c> –<c>lohSize</c> must be less than or equal to the size of an ephemeral segment.
trans-unit.target: <c>totalSize</c> - <c>lohSize</c> 必須小於或等於暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: For information on the size of an ephemeral segment, see the "Ephemeral generations and segments" section in the [Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md) article.
trans-unit.target: 如需暫時區段大小的資訊，請參閱[記憶體回收的基本概念](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md)一文中的＜暫時層代和區段＞一節。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in <c>totalSize</c> to use for large object heap (LOH) allocations.
trans-unit.target: <c>totalSize</c> 中要用於大型物件堆積 (LOH) 配置的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to disallow garbage collection during the execution of a critical path if a specified amount of memory is available for the large object heap and the small object heap.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在大型物件堆積與小型物件堆積有指定數量記憶體可用時，於執行關鍵路徑期間，禁止記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the runtime was able to commit the required amount of memory and the garbage collector is able to enter no GC region latency mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段可以認可所需的記憶體數量且記憶體回收行程可以進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%29> method attempts to place the garbage collector in no GC region latency mode, which disallows garbage collection while an app executes a critical region of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%29>方法會嘗試將記憶體回收行程中不允許記憶體回收，而應用程式執行的程式碼的重要區域無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime is unable to initially allocate the requested amount of memory, the garbage collector performs a full blocking garbage collection in an attempt to free additional memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段無法一開始配置要求的記憶體數量，記憶體回收行程會執行完全封鎖記憶體回收，嘗試釋放出額外的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector enters no GC region latency mode if it is able to allocate `lohSize` for the LOH and `totalSize` – `lohSize` for the small object heap (SOH).
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，它是否能夠配置`lohSize`如 LOH 和`totalSize`–`lohSize`針對小物件堆積 (SOH)。

trans-unit.source: `lohSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path for the LOH, and `totalSize` – `lohSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path for the SOH.
trans-unit.target: `lohSize` 必須要夠大，無法處理 LOH，針對發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置和`totalSize`–`lohSize`必須夠大，無法都處理的 SOH 中發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置。

trans-unit.source: This includes allocations by the app, as well as allocations that the runtime makes on the app's behalf.
trans-unit.target: 這包括應用程式時，所配置，以及執行階段可讓應用程式的代表的配置。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: You exit the no GC region latency mode by calling the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫結束無 GC 區域延遲模式<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="totalSize" /> – <paramref name="lohSize" /> exceeds the ephemeral segment size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="totalSize" /> - <paramref name="lohSize" /> 超過暫時區段大小。

trans-unit.source: The process is already in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理序處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory in bytes to allocate without triggering a garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在不觸發記憶體回收的情況下，要配置的記憶體數量 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: <c>totalSize</c> –<c>lohSize</c> must be less than or equal to the size of an ephemeral segment.
trans-unit.target: <c>totalSize</c> - <c>lohSize</c> 必須小於或等於暫時區段的大小。

trans-unit.source: For information on the size of an ephemeral segment, see the "Ephemeral generations and segments" section in the [Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md) article.
trans-unit.target: 如需暫時區段大小的資訊，請參閱[記憶體回收的基本概念](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md)一文中的＜暫時層代和區段＞一節。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in <c>totalSize</c> to use for large object heap (LOH) allocations.
trans-unit.target: <c>totalSize</c> 中要用於大型物件堆積 (LOH) 配置的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to omit a full blocking garbage collection if the garbage collector is initially unable to allocate the specified memory on the small object heap (SOH) and LOH; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示如果記憶體回收行程最初無法在小型物件堆積 (SOH) 及 LOH 上配置指定的記憶體，則省略完全封鎖記憶體回收；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to disallow garbage collection during the execution of a critical path if a specified amount of memory is available for the large object heap and the small object heap, and controls whether the garbage collector does a full blocking garbage collection if not enough memory is initially available.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在大型物件堆積與小型物件堆積有指定數量記憶體可用時，於執行關鍵路徑期間，禁止記憶體回收，並控制在最初沒有足夠的記憶體可用時，記憶體回收行程是否執行完全封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the runtime was able to commit the required amount of memory and the garbage collector is able to enter no GC region latency mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段可以認可所需的記憶體數量且記憶體回收行程可以進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method attempts to place the garbage collector in no GC region latency mode, which disallows garbage collection while an app executes a critical region of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%28System.Int64%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法會嘗試將記憶體回收行程中不允許記憶體回收，而應用程式執行的程式碼的重要區域無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: If the runtime is unable to initially allocate the requested amount of memory and the `disallowFullBlockingGC` argument is `false`, the garbage collector performs a full blocking garbage collection in an attempt to free additional memory; otherwise, the allocation fails, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行階段是無法一開始配置要求的記憶體數量和`disallowFullBlockingGC`引數是`false`、 記憶體回收行程會嘗試釋放出額外的記憶體來執行完全封鎖記憶體回收; 否則，請配置失敗，而且方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector enters no GC region latency mode if it is able to allocate `lohSize` for the LOH and `totalSize` – `lohSize` for the small object heap (SOH).
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程會進入無 GC 區域延遲模式，它是否能夠配置`lohSize`如 LOH 和`totalSize`–`lohSize`針對小物件堆積 (SOH)。

trans-unit.source: `lohSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path for the LOH, and `totalSize` – `lohSize` must be large enough to handle all memory allocations that occur in the critical path for the SOH.
trans-unit.target: `lohSize` 必須要夠大，無法處理 LOH，針對發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置和`totalSize`–`lohSize`必須夠大，無法都處理的 SOH 中發生的關鍵路徑中的所有記憶體配置。
