trans-unit.source: This includes allocations by the app, as well as allocations that the runtime makes on the app's behalf.
trans-unit.target: 這包括應用程式時，所配置，以及執行階段可讓應用程式的代表的配置。

trans-unit.source: Setting `disallowFullBlockingGC` to `true` to prevent a full blocking garbage collection if not enough memory is initially available is most useful in load balancing scenarios: one system can call this method and report itself as ready to accept requests if it returns `true`, and have the load balancer redirect requests to other systems if it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定`disallowFullBlockingGC`至`true`為了避免完整的封鎖記憶體回收集合，如果沒有足夠的記憶體一開始是負載平衡案例中最為有用： 一個系統可以呼叫這個方法，並報告本身為準備好接受要求，如果它傳回`true`，而且如果它傳回，將要求重新導向至其他系統的負載平衡器`false`。

trans-unit.source: It can then do a full blocking garbage collection when it's not handling requests by calling the <xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 它不藉由呼叫處理要求時，它可以再執行完全封鎖記憶體回收<xref:System.GC.Collect%28System.Int32%2CSystem.GCCollectionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot nest calls to the <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> method, and you should only call the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method if the runtime is currently in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 您無法巢狀呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>方法，而且您應該只呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法，如果執行階段目前處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: In other words, you should not call <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> multiple times (after the first method call, subsequent calls will not succeed), and you should not expect calls to <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> to succeed just because the first call to <xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A> succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，您不應該呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>多次 （第一個方法呼叫之後，後續呼叫將不會成功），和不應呼叫<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>才會成功，因為第一次呼叫<xref:System.GC.TryStartNoGCRegion%2A>成功。

trans-unit.source: You exit the no GC region latency mode by calling the <xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您藉由呼叫結束無 GC 區域延遲模式<xref:System.GC.EndNoGCRegion%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="totalSize" /> – <paramref name="lohSize" /> exceeds the ephemeral segment size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="totalSize" /> - <paramref name="lohSize" /> 超過暫時區段大小。

trans-unit.source: The process is already in no GC region latency mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理序處於無 GC 區域延遲模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of a registered notification for determining whether a full, blocking garbage collection by the common language runtime is imminent.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註冊通知的狀態，以判斷 Common Language Runtime 是否即將執行完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of a registered notification for determining whether a full, blocking garbage collection by the common language runtime is imminent.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註冊通知的狀態，以判斷 Common Language Runtime 是否即將執行完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The status of the registered garbage collection notification.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊記憶體回收通知的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus> enumeration returned by this method to determine the status of the current garbage collection notification that was registered by using the <xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus>來判斷目前記憶體回收通知的使用已註冊狀態，這個方法所傳回的列舉<xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A> method to determine whether the full garbage collection has completed.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A>方法，以判斷是否已完成完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: When the enumeration returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>, you can do tasks such as preventing additional objects from being allocated and inducing a collection yourself with the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當列舉型別傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>，您可以執行工作，例如防止其他物件所配置和與自行引發集合<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the notification does not guarantee that a full garbage collection will occur, only that conditions have reached the threshold that are favorable for a full garbage collection to occur.
trans-unit.target: 請注意通知並不保證，完整記憶體回收，就會發生，但是條件已達到是負責完整記憶體回收發生的臨界值。

trans-unit.source: This method waits indefinitely for a garbage collection notification to be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會無限期地等候取得記憶體回收通知。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a time-out period for the method to return if the notification cannot be obtained, use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定要傳回如果無法取得通知的方法逾時期間，使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method without specifying a time-out, you can call the <xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A> method if you are waiting longer than preferred.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定逾時呼叫這個方法，您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A>方法，如果您在慣用再等候。

trans-unit.source: You should follow this method with a call to the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A> method to make sure that you have had a full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 您應該遵循此方法透過呼叫<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A>方法，確定您有完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method alone causes indeterminate results.
trans-unit.target: 單獨呼叫這個方法會造成未定的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to determine whether a full, blocking garbage collection is approaching.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來判斷是否已接近完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the status of the notification is <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>, the user method `OnFullGCApproachNotify` is called to perform actions in response to the approaching collection.
trans-unit.target: 每當通知的狀態是<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>，使用者方法`OnFullGCApproachNotify`呼叫以執行動作以回應至接近的集合。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for [Garbage Collection Notifications](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分[記憶體回收通知](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/notifications.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The length of time to wait before a notification status can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 在可以取得通知之前所要等待的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: Specify -1 to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 指定 -1 會無限期等待。

trans-unit.source: Returns, in a specified time-out period, the status of a registered notification for determining whether a full, blocking garbage collection by the common language runtime is imminent.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的逾時期間傳回註冊通知的狀態，以判斷 Common Language Runtime 是否即將執行完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The status of the registered garbage collection notification.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊記憶體回收通知的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus> enumeration returned by this method to determine the status of the current garbage collection notification that was registered by using the <xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus>來判斷目前記憶體回收通知的使用已註冊狀態，這個方法所傳回的列舉<xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A> method to determine whether the full garbage collection has completed.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A>方法，以判斷是否已完成完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method returns immediately whenever a garbage collection notification status is obtained, regardless of the value specified by `millisecondsTimeout`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會傳回每次記憶體回收集合取得通知，不論所指定的值，請立即`millisecondsTimeout`。

trans-unit.source: If a garbage collection notification status is not obtained before `millisecondsTimeout` times out, this method returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.NotApplicable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果記憶體回收集合未取得通知之前`millisecondsTimeout`時間時，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.NotApplicable>。

trans-unit.source: When the enumeration returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>, you can do tasks such as preventing additional objects from being allocated and inducing a collection yourself with the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當列舉型別傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>，您可以執行工作，例如防止其他物件所配置和與自行引發集合<xref:System.GC.Collect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the notification does not guarantee that a full garbage collection will occur, only that conditions have reached the threshold that are favorable for a full garbage collection to occur.
trans-unit.target: 請注意通知並不保證，完整記憶體回收，就會發生，但是條件已達到是負責完整記憶體回收發生的臨界值。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A> method when you cannot wait for the time-out period to elapse.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A>方法時，您無法等候逾時時間過去。

trans-unit.source: You should follow this method with a call to the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A> method to make sure that you have had a full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 您應該遵循此方法透過呼叫<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCComplete%2A>方法，確定您有完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method alone causes indeterminate results.
trans-unit.target: 單獨呼叫這個方法會造成未定的結果。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> must be either non-negative or less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 必須為非負數，或是小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或 -1。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of a registered notification for determining whether a full, blocking garbage collection by the common language runtime has completed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註冊通知的狀態，以判斷 Common Language Runtime 是否已完成完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of a registered notification for determining whether a full, blocking garbage collection by the common language runtime has completed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註冊通知的狀態，以判斷 Common Language Runtime 是否已完成完整的封鎖記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: The status of the registered garbage collection notification.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊記憶體回收通知的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus> enumeration returned by this method to determine the status of the current garbage collection notification that was registered by using the <xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus>來判斷目前記憶體回收通知的使用已註冊狀態，這個方法所傳回的列舉<xref:System.GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A> method to determine whether a full garbage collection is imminent.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A>方法，以判斷是否即將完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: When the enumeration returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>, you can do tasks such as resuming work and obtaining a collection count with the <xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當列舉型別傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>，您可以執行工作，例如繼續工作，並取得與集合計數<xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method waits indefinitely for a garbage collection notification to be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會無限期地等候取得記憶體回收通知。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a time-out period for the method to return if the notification cannot be obtained, use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定要傳回如果無法取得通知的方法逾時期間，使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method without specifying a time-out, you can call the <xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A> method if you are waiting longer than preferred.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定逾時呼叫這個方法，您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A>方法，如果您在慣用再等候。

trans-unit.source: This method call should be preceded with a call to the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A> method to make sure that you have had a full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫應該在前面加上呼叫<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A>方法，確定您有完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method alone can produce indeterminate results.
trans-unit.target: 單獨呼叫這個方法可能會產生未定的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to determine whether a full garbage collection has completed.

trans-unit.source: If a garbage collection notification status is not obtained before `millisecondsTimeout` times out, this method returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.NotApplicable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果記憶體回收集合未取得通知之前`millisecondsTimeout`時間時，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.NotApplicable>。

trans-unit.source: When the enumeration returns <xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>, you can do tasks such as resuming work and obtaining a collection count with the <xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當列舉型別傳回<xref:System.GCNotificationStatus.Succeeded>，您可以執行工作，例如繼續工作，並取得與集合計數<xref:System.GC.CollectionCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A> method when you cannot wait for the time-out period to elapse.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.GC.CancelFullGCNotification%2A>方法時，您無法等候逾時時間過去。

trans-unit.source: This method call should be preceded with a call to the <xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A> method to make sure that you have had a full garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫應該在前面加上呼叫<xref:System.GC.WaitForFullGCApproach%2A>方法，確定您有完整記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method alone can produce indeterminate results.
trans-unit.target: 單獨呼叫這個方法可能會產生未定的結果。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> must be either non-negative or less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 必須為非負數，或是小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或 -1。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the current thread until the thread that is processing the queue of finalizers has emptied that queue.
trans-unit.target: 暫止目前的執行緒，直到處理完成項佇列的執行緒已經清空該佇列為止。

trans-unit.source: When the garbage collector finds objects that can be reclaimed, it checks each object to determine the object's finalization requirements.
trans-unit.target: 當記憶體回收行程會發現可以回收的物件時，它會檢查每個物件，以判斷物件的最終處理需求。

trans-unit.source: If an object implements a finalizer and has not disabled finalization by calling <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>, the object is placed in a list of objects that are marked as ready for finalization.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件實作完成項且具有未停用最終處理藉由呼叫<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>，該物件放在標示為準備進行最終處理物件的清單。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods for the objects in this list and removes the entries from the list.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>此清單中移除的項目從清單中物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until all finalizers have run to completion.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖直到所有的完成項已完成執行。

trans-unit.source: The thread on which finalizers are run is unspecified, so there is no guarantee that this method will terminate.
trans-unit.target: 完成項執行所在的執行緒未指定，因此不保證此方法將會終止。

trans-unit.source: However, this thread can be interrupted by another thread while the <xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A> method is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個執行緒可以會暫時中斷時的另一個執行緒<xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A>方法正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can start another thread that waits for a period of time and then interrupts this thread if this thread is still suspended.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以啟動另一個執行緒等候一段時間，然後插斷這個執行緒，如果仍然暫止這個執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A> method to suspend the current thread until finalization of all the collected objects is complete.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers%2A>暫停目前的執行緒，直到最終處理的所有收集到的物件已完成的方法。
